messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine the Great Pacific Mall with 15 stores. Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Sephora are all connected to each other. Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Nike are all connected to each other. Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Target are connected to each other. Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Target are connected to each other. Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are connected to each other. Nike is connected to Bath and Body Works. Levis, GNC Live Well and Target are connected to each other. H&M is connected to Zara. Sephora is connected to Bath and Body Works. GNC Live Well is connected to Target. You are in Starbucks and you find a magic coffee bean with which you can teleport to any room only once. From Starbucks, what is the path that yields the most reward? Please list the store names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Identify the connections from Starbucks.
Step 2: Choose the connection with the most reward potential.
Step 3: Move to the next store and repeat steps 1 and 2 until all stores have been visited or no more connections are available.

1. From Starbucks, we can teleport to Paris Baguette.
2. From Paris Baguette, we can visit H&M, Zara, and Marshalls.
3. From H&M, we can visit Zara and Marshalls.
4. From Zara, we can visit Marshalls.
5. From Marshalls, we can visit Target.
6. From Target, we can visit GNC Live Well, Levis, and Baskins and Robins.
7. From GNC Live Well, we can visit Levis.
8. From Levis, we can visit Baskins and Robins.
9. From Baskins and Robins, we can visit Chickflea.
10. From Chickflea, we can visit Nike.
11. From Nike, we can visit Carter Children, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works.
12. From Carter Children, we can visit Sephora and Bath and Body Works.
13. From Sephora, we can visit Bath and Body Works.
14. From Bath and Body Works, we have no more connections.

Answer: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Marshalls, Target, GNC Live Well, Levis, Baskins and Robins, Chickflea, Nike, Carter Children, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
